entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
